@abhikrit :If you only knew how to look for info on 20-40 uploads. If you could read properly, he provides info in detail for his torrents thats coz he maintains standards for particular format. For eg:

720p = for 16:9 aspect ratio (TV and movies) frame-size is 640p or 1120x640
             (because of my own limit of 1400 MB per encode)  
             or 1216x528-544 pixels for 2.35:1 (movies/theatrical AR),
             hardware intensive
